title: Crime Alert 10.12.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.12.21
description:
A father is killed for no apparent reason, then his son buries him in the backyard. A man lands in prison after posting something he thought was funny on social media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
